hello!

my name is Vivian and i enjoy visualizing data.

about work

here's a little about myself:

I'm a data visualization developer at the Urban Institute. I currently live in Washington D.C. and recently graduated with a Master's Degree at Johns Hopkins University in Government Analytics. I've only been in the data viz realm for less than a year but have been able to produce some cool things with D3 (although there is so much more to learn!).

fun facts:

I have a ginger cat named Maverick, who's obsessed with broccoli.
I spent two years studying in France, which has certainly contributed to my obsession of cheese.
I'm left-handed (I like to say that's where my creativity stems from).
